name: CobaltStrike Load by Rundll32
description: Rundll32 can be use by Cobalt Strike with StartW function to load DLLs from the command line.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*rundll32.exe* AND process.command_line:*.dll* AND process.command_line:(*\ StartW OR *,StartW))`
